revised_title: Pharmacological Analysis of Indaconitine and Bikhaconitine
tldr: This study examines the physiological effects and chemical composition of two new alkaloids, indaconitine and bikhaconitine, isolated from Indian aconite. The research explores their similarities and differences to previously studied alkaloids, such as aconitine and pseudaconitine, and discusses their potential toxic properties and pharmacological applications.
